channel.title: Svenscap3pk V2 questions
channel.description:
ok thanks to many of you I have nowgot an server running and its great.
Just a few questions when answering number the question to the answer
1.How do I change my level? 2.How do I get cash? 3.How do I eliminate LAG? 4.How do I make myself the owner? 5.How do I appoint people MODS and Admins? 6.How do I change my exp? 7.How do I change the title of the game? 8.How do I change what people say like e.g. We love our owner Sven or The owner is offline.
I use Svenscap3pk v2

item.title: Svenscap3pk V2 questions
item.dc:creator: @samcanbam samcanbam
item.description:
@samcanbam wrote:

[quote=“Fr33b1e, post:2, topic:65113”]1. Log in, log out, find your character file, then scroll down and look for skills, or just type ::master or ::pure when you become owner.
2. Look at Melissa’s post and it should tell, or make some ways.
3. Hamachi should eliminate some lag, but I think she said you need a strong computer to stop lag.
4. Go to your character file, and change your rights to 3, and save, then exit, make sure you’re logged off.
5. There is a command built in called ::givemodplayername, ::giveadminplayername, and ::giveownerplayername. Or, go into the character folder again, find the person you want, to make them Moderator, change rights to 1, to make admin, change rights to 2, to make Owner, change rights to 3, then save, and make sure they’re logged off.
6. Search for the case numbers I.E the door is case 823, then change the exp rate, or go into your character file, find your name, go to the bottom nearly, and change your exp in the skills you want.
7. Search for SvenScape3pk, and replace with whatever you want.
8. Go to NPCHandler.java, and search for what dialogue you want to change, then just change it and save.

I hope I answered your questions to the fullest.[/quote]

yea he pretty much summed it up!

well besicly all youlle need to learn with changing stuff is look through your client. and if its not there look through the other stuff. then if its not there its built into the cache and theres nothing you can do about it unless its somthing in the client your looking to change.

Read full topic

item.title: Svenscap3pk V2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

  1. Log in, log out, find your character file, then scroll down and look for skills, or just type ::master or ::pure when you become owner.
  2. Look at Melissa’s post and it should tell, or make some ways.
  3. Hamachi should eliminate some lag, but I think she said you need a strong computer to stop lag.
  4. Go to your character file, and change your rights to 3, and save, then exit, make sure you’re logged off.
  5. There is a command built in called ::givemodplayername, ::giveadminplayername, and ::giveownerplayername. Or, go into the character folder again, find the person you want, to make them Moderator, change rights to 1, to make admin, change rights to 2, to make Owner, change rights to 3, then save, and make sure they’re logged off.
  6. Search for the case numbers I.E the door is case 823, then change the exp rate, or go into your character file, find your name, go to the bottom nearly, and change your exp in the skills you want.
  7. Search for SvenScape3pk, and replace with whatever you want.
  8. Go to NPCHandler.java, and search for what dialogue you want to change, then just change it and save.

I hope I answered your questions to the fullest.

Read full topic
